cast.overview: After a family tragedy, three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Still haunted by Betelgeuse, Lydia's life is turned upside down when her teenage daughter, Astrid, accidentally opens the portal to the Afterlife.
cast.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice

details.biography: Chloe Driver is an experienced actress in TV, theatre and film as well as an award winning comedian. Currently staring in Daisy May Hudson's BBC Film Lollipop as Nina. She is also featured in Revolut's commercial with comedian Munya Chawawa. Last year she toured with Extant in an accessible theatre tour. Recent works also include alongside Kiell Smith-Bynoe on Lucy Pearman's Training as well as Jamie Redknapp on a Paddy Power Sketch. She has also worked on Baby Reindeer, Black Mirror, Lee Nelson's Well Funny People, Gameface, Eastenders, Call The Midwife and People Just do Nothing.
details.name: Chloe Driver
